# Task 1.1: Project Structure & Build Setup

**Phase**: 1 (Foundation)  
**Complexity**: Small  
**Status**: Not Started

## Description

Initialize Go module and establish the directory structure for the Stalkeer backend application. Set up build configuration to produce binaries in the `bin/` directory.

## Details

- Create `/cmd/main.go` entry point
- Create `/internal/{models,config,database,api,parser}` packages
- Set up `go.mod` with required dependencies:
  - `github.com/jinzhu/gorm` (database ORM)
  - `github.com/gin-gonic/gin` (REST API framework)
  - `github.com/spf13/cobra` (CLI framework)
  - `github.com/spf13/viper` (configuration management)
  - `github.com/lib/pq` (PostgreSQL driver)
- Create comprehensive `.gitignore` with Go standards and project-specific files
- Update build configuration for binary output to `bin/`
- Create `.github/workflows/` structure for CI/CD (basic)

## Dependencies

None (foundational task)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `go build -o bin/stalkeer cmd/main.go` executes without errors
- [ ] Directory structure matches specification
- [ ] All dependencies resolve correctly
- [ ] Binary builds with correct name and location
- [ ] `.gitignore` prevents commits of build artifacts and local config files
